title: Please riot can i have 2 rp for a skin boost
body:
I currently have 93 rp which is useless and really want the 2 for a skin boost to share with my mates if you can help me out would be greatly appreciated if not that is also fine 

thankyou for your time

replies.body: You can submit a ticket to [Support](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) (I'd recommend the "I have a question about League of Legends/Riot Games." option) with a LoL related artwork (doesn't have to be good, just recognisable as LoL) requesting a small amount of RP, up to 50 if I'm not mistaken. The support staff should be happy to oblige as long as you've not received the RP gift before as it is a one-time offer per account. Keep in mind, it may take a couple days to receive a response from Support.
